burlap.mdp.singleagent.model

Interface TaskFactoredModel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SampleModel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FactoredModel

    public interface TaskFactoredModel
extends SampleModel
    An interface for a SampleModel that computes its rewards and terminal states using RewardFunction and TerminalFunction objects that can be modified.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RewardFunction rewardFunction()
      Returns the RewardFunction this model uses to compute rewards
      TerminalFunction terminalFunction()
      Returns the TerminalFunction this model uses to determine terminal states
      void useRewardFunction(RewardFunction rf)
      Tells this model to use the corresponding RewardFunction
      void useTerminalFunction(TerminalFunction tf)
      Tells this model to use the corresponding TerminalFunction

      • Methods inherited from interface burlap.mdp.singleagent.model.SampleModel

        sample, terminal
